sentence: More  than  1,400  people  died  in  the  attack,  including  hundreds  of  people  killed  in  their  homes  and  at  a  music  festival,  Israeli  officials  say.
More  than  1,400  people  died  in  the  attack,  including  hundreds  of  people  killed  in  their  homes  and  at  a  music  festival,  Israeli  officials  say.
